      public static String checkAndFilterName(String name) throws InvalidNameException
      Check and perform getNameCheckRegex on any town/nation names
      Parameters:
      name - - Town/Nation name String
      Returns:
      result of getNameCheckRegex
      Throws:
      InvalidNameException - if the name parsed is blacklisted

    • checkAndFilterPlayerName

      public static String checkAndFilterPlayerName(String name) throws InvalidNameException
      Check and perform regex on any player names
      Parameters:
      name - of a player in String format.
      Returns:
      String of the valid name result.
      Throws:
      InvalidNameException - if the player name is invalid.

      Returns:

    • isBlacklistName

      public static boolean isBlacklistName(String name)
      Is this name in our blacklist? If not a blacklist, call isValidName and return true if it is an invalid name.
      Parameters:
      name - - Name to be checked for invalidity.
      Returns:
      true if this name is blacklist/invalid

    • isConfigBlacklistedName

      public static boolean isConfigBlacklistedName(String name)
      Does this name not pass the config blacklist at plugin.name_blacklist
      Parameters:
      name - String name to check.
      Returns:
      true if this is something that isn't allowed in the config's name blacklist.

    • isValidName

      public static boolean isValidName(String name)
      Is this a valid name via getNameCheckRegex
      Parameters:
      name - - String containing a name from getNameCheckRegex
      Returns:
      true if this name is valid.
